languages.text: "{name}... Нет, просить тебя одуматься бесполезно, я знаю — ты не отступишься". {n}Соломон прижимает кулак к груди, в его голосе на мгновение прорезается боль.{/n} "Я санкционирую твое решение и целиком беру вину за происходящее. Ты можешь взять десятину, но хотя бы в этом мне не отказывай".

"{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."
languages.original_text: "{name}... Нет, просить тебя одуматься бесполезно, я знаю — ты не отступишься". {n}Соломон прижимает кулак к груди, в его голосе на мгновение прорезается боль.{/n} "Я санкционирую твое решение и целиком беру вину за происходящее. Ты можешь взять десятину, но хотя бы в этом мне не отказывай".

traits.locale_text: "{name}... No, begging you to come to your senses will not do. I know you will not give up." {n}Solomorne briefly presses a fist to his chest, his voice trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and take full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but at least do not deny me as much."

"{name}... No, begging you to come to your senses will not do. I know you will not give up." {n}Solomorne briefly presses a fist to his chest, his voice trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and take full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but at least do not deny me as much."

You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

"{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

"{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

languages.text: "{name} ... Nein, es bringt nichts, Euch zu bitten, Vernunft anzunehmen. Ich weiß, Ihr werdet nicht aufgeben." {n}Solomorne legt seine Faust an seine Brust und erklärt mit bebender Stimme:{/n} "Ich werde Eure Entscheidung autorisieren und übernehme die volle Verantwortung für alles, was jetzt passiert. Ihr könnt den Zehnt haben, aber verwehrt mir das nicht."
languages.original_text: "{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

traits.locale_text: "{name} ... Nein, es bringt nichts, Euch zu bitten, Vernunft anzunehmen. Ich weiß, Ihr werdet nicht aufgeben." {n}Solomorne legt seine Faust an seine Brust und erklärt mit bebender Stimme:{/n} "Ich werde Eure Entscheidung autorisieren und übernehme die volle Verantwortung für alles, was jetzt passiert. Ihr könnt den Zehnt haben, aber verwehrt mir das nicht."

languages.text: « {name}... Non, il est inutile d'essayer de vous raisonner. Je sais que vous ne changerez pas d'avis. » {n}Solomorne presse son poing contre sa poitrine et continue d'une voix tremblante de douleur.{/n} « J'autorise votre décision et assume l'entière responsabilité de ses conséquences. Vous pouvez prendre la dîme, mais accordez-moi au moins cela. »
languages.original_text: "{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

traits.locale_text: « {name}... Non, il est inutile d'essayer de vous raisonner. Je sais que vous ne changerez pas d'avis. » {n}Solomorne presse son poing contre sa poitrine et continue d'une voix tremblante de douleur.{/n} « J'autorise votre décision et assume l'entière responsabilité de ses conséquences. Vous pouvez prendre la dîme, mais accordez-moi au moins cela. »

languages.text: “{name}……算了，看来我是没办法让你恢复理智了，我知道你绝对不会放弃。”{n}索罗蒙将拳头按在胸口上，声音颤抖，痛苦不已。{/n}“我愿意同意你的决定，我也愿意为接下来发生的所有事情承担全部责任。什一税你可以取走，但不要把我排除在外。”
languages.original_text: "{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

traits.locale_text: “{name}……算了，看来我是没办法让你恢复理智了，我知道你绝对不会放弃。”{n}索罗蒙将拳头按在胸口上，声音颤抖，痛苦不已。{/n}“我愿意同意你的决定，我也愿意为接下来发生的所有事情承担全部责任。什一税你可以取走，但不要把我排除在外。”

languages.text: «{name}... No, no servirá de nada decirle que sea sensat{mf|o|a}. Sé que no va a rendirse». {n}Solomorne se lleva el puño al pecho y su voz tiembla de dolor por un instante.{/n} «Autorizo su decisión y asumo toda la responsabilidad por lo que pueda ocurrir. Puede llevarse el diezmo, pero no me arrebate eso».
languages.original_text: "{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

traits.locale_text: «{name}... No, no servirá de nada decirle que sea sensat{mf|o|a}. Sé que no va a rendirse». {n}Solomorne se lleva el puño al pecho y su voz tiembla de dolor por un instante.{/n} «Autorizo su decisión y asumo toda la responsabilidad por lo que pueda ocurrir. Puede llevarse el diezmo, pero no me arrebate eso».

languages.text: 「{name}…いえ、正気に戻ってくださいとお願いしても無駄でしょう。あなたが引き下がらないことは分かっています」{n}ソロモーンは拳を胸に当てた。その声は一瞬、痛みに震える。{/n}「あなたの決断を認めます。この後に起こるすべての責任は私が負いましょう。租税を持って行ってください。ですが、承認の役割は私にやらせてください」
languages.original_text: "{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}…いえ、正気に戻ってくださいとお願いしても無駄でしょう。あなたが引き下がらないことは分かっています」{n}ソロモーンは拳を胸に当てた。その声は一瞬、痛みに震える。{/n}「あなたの決断を認めます。この後に起こるすべての責任は私が負いましょう。租税を持って行ってください。ですが、承認の役割は私にやらせてください」

languages.text: "Hayır, aklınızı başına toparlamak istemekle olmaz. Vazgeçmeyeceğinizi biliyorum." {n}Bir yumruğunu göğsüne bastıran Solomorne'un sesi anlık bir acıyla titriyor.{/n} "Kararınızı onaylayacağım, bundan sonra olacakların tüm sorumluluğunu üstleneceğim. Aşarı alabilirsiniz ancak beni bundan mahrum bırakmayın."
languages.original_text: "{name}... No, asking you to come to your senses won't do. I know you won't give up." {n}Solomorne presses a fist to his chest, his voice momentarily trembling with pain.{/n} "I will authorise your decision and assume full blame for what happens next. You may take the tithe, but do not deny me that."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, aklınızı başına toparlamak istemekle olmaz. Vazgeçmeyeceğinizi biliyorum." {n}Bir yumruğunu göğsüne bastıran Solomorne'un sesi anlık bir acıyla titriyor.{/n} "Kararınızı onaylayacağım, bundan sonra olacakların tüm sorumluluğunu üstleneceğim. Aşarı alabilirsiniz ancak beni bundan mahrum bırakmayın."
